{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 802.11n Wireless Ndx Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://www.usr.com/en-support/product?prod=5464 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = USRobotics |model = USR5464 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MXF-R950630GN |icid = 550A-15040 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4704; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 264 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638165TS-6G; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325F; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |totlan = <!-- total lan ports --> |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 00:14:C1
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 15 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = USR5464,USR5464_SES_XXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^USR5464$,,,^USR5464_SES_[0-9]{5}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/24/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Gemtek WMIB-212GN |rad1modif = Mini PCI (long) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4321; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2055; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The default SSID is '''USR5464''', however, the device supports ''SecureEasySetup''. :When configured using SecureEasySetup, the device takes on a SSID :of USR5464_SES_XXXXX where XXXXX is a random number.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:USRobotics_USR5464_front.jpg|front File:USRobotics_USR5464_angle.jpg|angle File:USRobotics_USR5464_top.jpg|top File:USRobotics_USR5464_back.jpg|back File:USRobotics_USR5464_bottom.jpg|bottom File:USRobotics_USR5464_label.jpg|label File:USRobotics_USR5464_box.jpg|box </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]]
